dspins 2.1.3
  • Reference

Reference

Boards

Load .env file to authenticate access to board and create boards

load_env()

Load env variables

ds_board_s3()

Use a folder within an AWS S3 bucket as a board.

Reading and writing pins

pin_read()

Read DS pins

pin_write()

Write DS pins

pin_urls()

Write DS pins and return URLs

Pin functions

Check for existence of pins, delete pins, get meta data

pin_exists()

DS pin exists

pin_delete()

Delete DS pins

pin_meta()

DS pin meta

Board functions

Get list of pins saved to board

pin_list()

DS pin list

Other

create_ds_links()

Create ds links

Internal functions

Functions that power the reading and writing of pins

pin_fetch()

Fetch a DS pin

pin_store()

Store a DS pin

dspin_save()

Save DS elements
